Literature.Title: Antibacterial Potential Analysis of Novel α-Helix Peptides in the Chinese Wolf Spider Lycosa sinensis
Literature.Author: Tan H, Wang J, Song Y, Liu S, Lu Z, Luo H, Tang X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella typhimurium CGMCC 1.1174(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2012883(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2018675(MIC=6.25µM),Shigella dysenteriae CGMCC 1.1869(MIC=50µM),Proteus vulgaris CGMCC 1.1651(no activity data),Staphylococcus citreus CCTCC AB 91115(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CGMCC 1.3374(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(no activity data),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=50-100),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=25-50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(no activity data),Escherichia coli(MIC=25-50µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2012883(no activity data)
